name: Tourencina Village
description:
This is a low poly trash game in which the character can roam freely in a easy to use third person view. It incorporates many assets downloaded from the unity assets store to create the town and encampment. I created the basic animations for the doors of the village so they open when you approach and close when you are far away.

Attribution:

Free 3rd Person Camera Setup & Camera Collision Tutorial -
